extendedInfo.description: Navagraha Temples (Sthalams) in Tamil NaduTamil Nadu, especially the Thanjavur / Kumbakonam Cauvery Delta region is replete with temples. Apart from being the abodes of the Gods where one goes to prey and seek solace, these temples are also known for their architectural beauty.  It is customory for the people who follow the Hindu faith and believe in the power of the planets, to visit the Navagraha temples and seek the blessings of the âGrahasâ.  The cluster of the most famous Navagraha Temples (The Nine Planets) dating from the Chola dynasty are located in and around Kumbakonam, Tamil Nadu, India.  This Android application named NavagrahaTemples is our humble offering to help the people locate and reach the temples. The temples that have the shrines for the Grahas are :    Surya Navagrahastalam -- Sooriyanar Kovil    Chandra Navagrahastalam -- Thingaloor    Angaarakan Navagrahastalam -- Vaitheeswaran Kovil    Budha Navagrahastalam -- Thiruvenkadu    Guru Navagrahastalam -- Alangudi    Sukra Navagrahastalam -- Kanjanur    Shani Navagrahastalam -- Thirunallar    Raahu Navagrahastalam -- Thirunageswaram    Ketu Navagrahastalam -- Keezhperumpallam

reviews.title: Ganapathy
reviews.comment: Only Budhan temple details seen from Galaxy Y. Unable to mavigate further.
